name: Mr.Krishnakumar S
department: Dept. of Applied Mathematics & Computational Sciences, PSG College of Technology, Coimbatore, Tamilnadu, India.
qualifications: B.Sc  ( Physics )  - Loyola College,Madras University   - 2005M.C.A  - Vellore Institute of Technology   - 2008M.E  ( Computer Science )  - K.Ramakrishnan College of Technology,Anna University   - 2014
in_brief: Mr.S.Krishnakumar is an Assistant Professor in the Department of Applied Mathematics and Computational Sciences at PSG College of Technology,Coimbatore.He has over 12 years of experience in Teaching.He has cleared TN-SET in 2012 and NET in 2019.
